name: Terry, the spider
description:
Meet Terry, your new virtual pet!

I built this off of a demo I made up for inverse kinematics - the walking is not an animation, it's all dynamic. Unfortunately, the full physics-based motion I originally made doesn't translate well to computer controlled AI.

Speaking of AI, Terry has a modest amount of it himself. When he has nothing to do, Terry will explore, but if he gets thirsty, he'll drink; tired, he'll sleep; and if he sees a tasty centipede he'll get a delicious snack :)

I had a ton more ideas about implementing games, dancing, and the ability to pet terry, but I ran out of time :(
